name: Perfect Popstar
description:
In Perfect Popstar you have to gain as much followers as you can to be the V.I.P of the show. To achieve this goal, you have to stay under the spotlight as long as you can. At the end of the show, if one of your opponent have more followers than you, nobody will recognize you and you will be unknown in the world of popstars.

Important : Play in full screen mode or when you’ll press the down key, the webpage will go down as well + click on the screen after the game is loaded.

Follow the spotlight ->  Gain followers !One of your opponent is most famous than you  ->      People will ask you : « who are you? » You have most followers than your oppponents ->
You become the V.I.P. of the show Go on the left or rightArrow Key Left/RightMove up or down         Arrow Key Up/Down

The game was created by Matteo Benaissa in 3 hours for the Trijam 86 with the theme Stars. (result : 1st out of 18). The cover art design is inspired from an Anonymous ad of 1900.
